work.summary: As a member of the frontend team I would lead frontend development for teams when building new features, working closely with designers.
highlights: Lead a team to improve overall User experience of our application.

worked on relieving admin burden by introducing campaigns that provide compelling content to end users. This feature allowed admins to browse a list of campaigns and see which ones suit their users and be able to download and publish directly on the dashboard.
Developed and published white-label mobile apps for customer hubs
Developed multihub tools that empowered enterprise customers with multiple products
Built out B2B Hub application that allows all Businesses to manage their account.
Built Telus’ small business challenge website, using Contentful with React and Redux, allowing for quick deployments and allowing stakeholders to update information on demand.
Redesigning and rebuilding the entire Drivetest system across Ontario that delivers 1 million+ exams per anum.

Developed Sportchek VDK (Virtual Department Store Kiosk) and Video Wall applications. These applications were a part of Sportchek’s in-store innovations which allow customers to interact with products in active engaging ways.
Headed development on complete rework on Minted’s product Upload Process.
Developed customer facing JavaScript-based WYSIWYG document editor. Features include creating flexible tables, uploading and manipulating images and document import and exporting
